rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0001
rows.name:
We still don't know where Metsu is,
and we've got some time
before Hugo returns...

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0002
rows.name:
We need to take out the Occupide Gogols
so they can finish repairing
Lett Bridge.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0003
rows.name: Right. That's our goal for now.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0005
rows.name:
They're one of the more
ferocious monsters around here.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0006
rows.name:
If I got serious, though,
it'd be over in a few seconds.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0007
rows.name:
Better not. You'd probably
blow away the bridge, too.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0010
rows.name: So you would blow it up...

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0011
rows.name:
Repairing Lett Bridge is essential
for travel to and from the capital.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0012
rows.name:
For the people of Aletta, too.
Let's take down those Occupide Gogols.
